title: Triumvir

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose two other players to form a Triumvirate with at the end of the day.
- During the night, dissolve the current Triumvirate at the end of the night. You must wait a day to form another Triumvirate.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The three players of the Triumvirate will know each other's roles and share a chat together.
- Town roles in the Triumvirate may only perform night abilities if all three players agree.
- Players in the Triumvirate will not have their Last Will shown.

desc:
Post 1238
*Together as three, almost anything is possible.*
